functional.notes: Bundle layout + required artifacts are encoded in code and documented in the output contract template.
evidence: pipeline/src/fusbal_pipeline/cli.py _build_manifest_v1() uses the expected artifact list (sorted by artifact_id).
spec/md/docs/data/OUTPUT_CONTRACT.mdt documents the layout and required artifacts.
findings: Required/optional artifacts are explicitly enumerated with stable ids.
Manifest artifacts list is validated to match expected list exactly (determinism).

correctness_safety.notes: Layout validation fails fast with explicit missing paths.
findings: Required artifacts checked deterministically (no implicit defaults).

performance.notes: Layout validation is O(number_of_artifacts) and bounded.
findings: No full-directory scans; checks only known paths.

security.notes: No command execution; paths scoped to bundle root.
findings: Uses Path operations; avoids unsafe shell usage.

maintainability.notes: Layout constants are centralized and referenced by CLI.
findings: Single source of truth for artifact ids/paths.

summary.notes: Meets functional acceptance; main follow-up is tightening documentation of provenance vs portability for inputs.* fields.
